channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook
channel.desc: Donal shares recipes to suit every kind of busy household, with new, easy-to-follow recipes, time-saving hacks and practical cooking tips, including the kitchen gadgets that Donal relies on at home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: Drew and Jonathan beautifully transform the family room, dining room, kitchen, and main ensuite to give them room to move in with their new husband and wife.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a show celebrating contemporary African lifestyle. The show seeks out the continent's finest design and lifestyle innovation across the spectrum - from interiors and architecture to fashion, arts, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Carlene kicks off the show Queensland showcasing coastal mansion with ocean views. Adam Gives an inspirational recipe you can use at home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Grand Designs UK
channel.desc: Grand Designs UK, hosted by designer and writer Kevin McCloud, follows intrepid homebuilders as they pursue their architectural dreams.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: The Gardener
channel.desc: Tanya shares a pot stand DIY with serious presence. We look at must have grey foliage plants and visit a garden with loads of inspiration.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We take a closer look at what Arthritis is and how to assist dealing with it, we discuss a common infection which is known as a swimmer's ear, and we explore kinesiology.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
channel.desc: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food is the ultimate set of go-to recipes that are quick to cook and easy to remember.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Art Of Architecture
channel.desc: Named Young British Architect of the Year in 1998, Niall McLaughlin has never looked back. Today we take a look at his latest contribution, a new library for Magdalene College Cambridge.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: Finest Homes explores modern masterpieces and character-filled design, talking to the visionaries who are bringing them to life, as well as the people who live in them.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Garden Heroes
channel.desc: The Garden Heroes experts are visiting 3 gardens under the theme of 'Attention Grabbers'.
